name: UNIX SERVER MANAGEMENT
short_description:
A Report Document Of Elaborated Developments 

The whole project is divided in three parts

1. Connection: establish connection within two computers without password and synchronize two folders in those computers

2. Backups: with the help of cron and rsync we will be able to do a complete backup and three incremental backups in a month 

3. Debian Package: Is more or less the same thing with the first part of this project (connection) but one of the differences is that if this package is install it will represents root in this part of the project, means the scripts involve in connection and their execution will take place in this package. This is going to allow the user to be able to install and remove with ease any application pertaining to the package without any traces of them. 

Generally the advantage of this project is to simplify ways to realize repetitive work and/or task
 
for further information please check the full documentation of this project
summary: 2º year of computing & systems development practical on UNIX Admin
